title: funny/April fools skin idea
body:
"Definitely a support" skin line where assassins/bruisers dress up as support champions
ex: zed dressed as sona (with the pig tails of course)
katarina dressed as soraka (bananas for knives)
syndra dressed as karma
sion dressed as braum??
and so on

replies.body: Order of the Orange Gangplank: Legendary.
I'll plus one, but only if I get the reverse. "Definitely a Bruiser/Assassin" with the likes of Braum in Katarina's clothers and Sona dressed as Zed lmao.
Definitely an ADC Soraka!  Not that she wasn't always in my heart.

Ezreal dressed as Taric?

and as a Reverse Taric dressed as Ezreal?  It would make the best botlane.

You mean like Warwick dressed as Urf Kench

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RYpX3O6sklY/WHVFklug0PI/AAAAAAAAbpE/QEDqV6Wqp_82OXvhcFp9Se3fAARmRovJwCEw/s640/Warwick_Splash_2.jpg

https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/skins-april-fools-2016/en_US/26d3e1b9ee06d89a7f315760cc44daaadac0ab34/assets/images/icon-urf-kench.jpg
Katarina dressed as me... that would be a nice joke *cough cough*
